reviewText: Handsome, buffed Yvan Cournoyer proves that he's a good sport by stripping down to white bikini briefs, pouring and smearing various primary colors of paint all over his body, and using himself as a "human painbrush" to create a painting on a large piece of canvas spread over the floor.  Scandalously short running time for the price--and some of that time consists of a replay of footage we've already seen!  And, oddly enough, we're never shown the completed "work of art."
